sentences.en: A: Fold up your bedding, and change the pillowcase.
sentences.cn: 整理好你的床铺, 同时换一下枕套.

sentences.en: Does the Sona Pillow come with a pillowcase?
sentences.cn: 舒鼾枕有专门的枕套 吗 ?

sentences.en: For an extra-calming treat, take a nap on a pillow scented with lavender—either in fabric spray form, or crumble some of the plant itself and put it in your pillowcase.
sentences.cn: 想要更加平静的话，在洒有薰衣草的枕头或者喷有香薰的织物再或者是填充了薰衣草碎屑的枕套上小憩一会。

sentences.en: I made a snake bag out of a pillowcase, as Helen had instructed.
sentences.cn: 我用枕套做了个蛇袋, 就像海伦教我的那样.

sentences.en: I'll a pillowcase over my head.
sentences.cn: 我会用枕套把头包住的那来吧!

sentences.en: She edged the pillowcase with lace.
So this Halloween, after kids make the rounds, blame the excitement surrounding the holiday for your child’s jumpy behavior -- not the pillowcase protruding with candy.
sentences.cn: 所以这个万圣节，如果孩子们要完糖都兴奋过头，要怪就去怪节日的燃点吧，别误会了枕套里溢出来的糖果。

sentences.en: That pillowcase thing, I thought you were doing The Nun.
sentences.cn: 我以为你披枕头套是在学“快乐的修女”

sentences.en: The spun silk is the best material for pillowcase.
sentences.cn: 绢丝是做枕套的最好料子.

trans.tran_en: a cloth cover for a pillow
